title: Islamabad Police arrest main suspect in murder case
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 07 (APP):The Islamabad police have arrested the main suspect, Umar Akbar, involved in the murder of Waheed Khan, who was shot dead in the Karachi Company area on August 6.
The police acted swiftly on the orders of DIG Islamabad, Syed Ali Raza, who took notice of the incident and directed the team to apprehend the accused as soon as possible.
DIG lauded the police team, assuring that the accused will be presented in court with solid evidence.
